xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(normalize-space(substring-after(., '.'))) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="translate(substring-after(., '.'), 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ', 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz')" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="domain"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain/@name = '${domain}'">${domain}</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="contains('${domain}', //domain/@name)"> <xsl:value-of select="//domain/@name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="host"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@os-type = '${os type}']/@name = '${host name}'">${host name}</xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">*</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@os-type = '${os type}' and @name = $host])"> <xsl:copy-of select="//domain[@name = $domain]/hosts/host[@os-type = '${os type}' and @name = $host]/remediation" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:copy-of select="//domain[@name = '*']/hosts/host[@os-type = '*' and @name = '*']/remediation" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <connection-details> <xsl:copy-of select="//invocation-mechanism" /> <xsl:copy-of select="//adapter-name" /> <hostname> <xsl:value-of select="//component/@name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </hostname> <xsl:copy-of select="//username" /> <xsl:copy-of select="//password" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="//adapter-options/*" mode="adapter-options" /> <xsl:apply-templates select="//command-options/*" mode="command-options" /> </connection-details> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@*|node()" mode="adapter-options"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@*|node()" mode="command-options"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:variable name="osname"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains("${os}", "windows")"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Windows Default</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Linux</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <fat-command> <commands> <xsl:attribute name="os-id"> <xsl:value-of select="$osname" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:for-each select="remediation/commands/*"> <xsl:variable name="operation"> <xsl:value-of select="local-name()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:variable> <xsl:for-each select="./*"> <command> <xsl:attribute name="os-id"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="contains("${os}", "window")"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Windows Default</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Linux</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:copy-of select="node()" /> </command> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:for-each> </commands> </fat-command> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="line" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Command: </xsl:text> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(substring-after(//line[@index = "3"], ":")) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-after(//line[@index = "3"], ":")" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="//command/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(.) > 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> Remediation output: </xsl:text> <xsl:for-each select="//output/*"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> Remediation output: Data not available </xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="value " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Remediation Data: Performing requested action with configured command.... </xsl:text> <xsl:apply-templates select="//line" /> </value> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="line"> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//command-output/metadata/status/text() = 'success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="//command-output/metadata/status/text() = 'error' and contains(., 'service has already been started')"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="command command-output notes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <remediation-output> <status>${sucess message}</status> <command>${command}</command> <command-output> <xsl:apply-templates select="//line" /> </command-output> <start-time>${start time}</start-time> <end-time>${end time}</end-time> </remediation-output> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="line"> <xsl:value-of select="concat(' ', .)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
